channel.title: New 317||Bossing|| Great pking || flawless combat system || custom minigame!
channel.description:
I have blanked a lot of things out in the pictures as this is an old advertisement
Features:
Ressurectionx has these features below: Flawless combat system Target system with target points Automated Voting System Donator zone and Extreme donator zone Great community All rs07 bosses and almost all skills except for farming (under construction) + more new bosses! Working minigames Grandpa Jack minigame were you can get the rarest items (depends on how far you come in waves) Fight pits with rewards such as pkp and cash Stable economy Constant updates All monsters give Slayer exp Double pkp weekends Random Statues Drops Last man standing Elite donator have the ability to ::loginmsg Super donator can have a custom tag God Reputation Daily gamble
and ofcourse since were pking based our quest tab is full of pking based tags such as god reputation kill counts death counts target kills and points and many more below. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FRM4fCo.png[/img]
shops location below ::shops with a lot more added! [IMG]http://imgur.com/O2FhSgl[/img]
and of course the bosses ::boss or quest tab [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Wj8nF8l.png[/img]
Best minigame to make money is granpa jack picture below [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uV4hOWw.png[/img]
Saradomin pledging [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LUXHMrS.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HGYoYW2.png[/img]
Zamorak pledging
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fACz2ZL.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8fdB1z5.png[/img]
Free point shop to use for free items to pking with for begginers or boss, verry usefull!
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0zW0y7N.png[/img]
High risk pking in a special place were you risk everything skulled
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pJkBLFQ.png[/img]
Pk point Store! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gYJ9XKN.png[/img]
we are brand new and already a lot of updates have been done! to join today play now at -
Website [URL=http://"http://ressurectionx.x10.mx/"]http://ressurectionx.x10.mx/[/URL] Download Client [URL=http://"http://ressurectionx.x10.mx/Asteriusx_pk.jar"]http://ressurectionx.x10.mx/Asteriusx_pk.jar[/URL] Webclient [URL=http://"http://ressurectionx.x10.mx/play2.php"]http://ressurectionx.x10.mx/play2.php[/URL]

item.title: New 317||Bossing|| Great pking || flawless combat system || custom minigame!
item.dc:creator: @tekkit tekkit
item.description:
@tekkit wrote:

I have blanked a lot of things out in the pictures as this is an old advertisement

Features:

Ressurectionx has these features below:
Flawless combat system
Target system with target points
Automated Voting System
Donator zone and Extreme donator zone
Great community
All rs07 bosses and almost all skills except for farming (under construction) + more new bosses!
Working minigames
Grandpa Jack minigame were you can get the rarest items (depends on how far you come in waves)
Fight pits with rewards such as pkp and cash
Stable economy
Constant updates
All monsters give Slayer exp
Double pkp weekends
Random Statues Drops
Last man standing
Elite donator have the ability to ::loginmsg
Super donator can have a custom tag
God Reputation
Daily gamble

and ofcourse since were pking based our quest tab is full of pking based tags such as god reputation kill counts death counts target kills and points and many more below.

shops location below ::shops
with a lot more added!

and of course the bosses ::boss or quest tab
